mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `new_user` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL, `password` char(128) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'MD5+SHA512', `auth` enum('admin','user') CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
